评论详情: I love these tanks they fit just right for my curvy body type. I’m 5’7 and wear a size 18.  They’re not too short either as I’m finding a lot of tanks and tees now have that cropped length that is just not flattering on me. The material isn’t too thin or too thick, they’re great to wear as a summer tank or layered in cooler temps. They also machine wash and dry well with no shrinkage. One last thing the shirt they have labeled as the color purple is more like a faded mauve/pink color which is why I bought the shirt. The color is pretty but most definitely not what I’d consider ‘purple’. Anyhow that’s the only thing I found a bit odd as far as the color label but as I said I bought it for the color shown not what the company listed it as. They do have actual ‘purple’ ones for those who want a true purple. Just thought I’d mention that.
My favorite tank tops. I have in several colors. Very faltering. Lots of stretch but not saggy. They are thicker and the colors are true to what you see. Sizing is accurate as well.

评论概述: Size Down for a Better Fit, but Be Cautious if You Have Sensitive Skin!
评论详情: This tank top is very stretchy. I’d recommend sizing down for a tighter fit. I like the buttons and the overall look. The material is soft but has a bit of a poky texture, so if you have sensitive skin like me, it might be a little irritating.

For some reason, Amazon recommended I order a size medium in this shirt. I decided to order small and medium in each of the colors I wanted. The smalls fit perfectly, so I will be sending the mediums back. For reference I am 5'5 and 125lbs. My chest is a 36B.  For some reason, clothing companies seem to be making shirts too long and too big. I'm not pregnant and don't want to look pregnant, nor do I want my shirt hanging past my butt. The length of these shirts you could tuck in or leave out. The tail does not go over my rear end. I have a farm and horses to take care of, so I'm outside most of the day in the summer. These shirts will be perfect for my work. With sunscreen of course!

This top is not the material I expected it’s. Little bit of a slinky material. It’s cute, the neckline is higher than I thought. It also runs small it would seem. I got an xl, that fits like a large. But it’s meant to be slim. I like it except that it has a sour smell. I definitely wash before wearing so not a problem, I’m just weary of shrinking.

I have 2 of these in different colors. The material is nice and has some stretch to it. It's a little thin but isn't see through. The color is as advertised. It fit's well and is true to size. I am 5'4", 135lbs with a larger bust and a Medium fits perfect.I would get a size bigger if you want it loose, otherwise it fits just like on the model.I love this tank.I've received several compilments on this shirt.

Love this tank top. Super comfortable with a good stretch. Washes great, it doesn’t shrink and doesn’t over stretch. It’s a good thickness where it doesn’t show bra lines at all. I would definitely buy this again.
Runs big but very nicely made and cute

评论概述: Color isn’t the greatest as pictured
评论详情: I bought these tank tops in different colors. I would size down if you want it to fit tighter and perfect. I purchase a size Medium first. Thought it was too perfect. Never shrank or anything. When I purchased the Large they are too baggy. Should’ve retuned them. Some of the colors are not as pictured as well. The material isn’t the greatest.
I really like the color and the fit.
This is pretty comfortable and OK quality for the unknown brand. That said, it is a little bit, so size down if you want more form fitting.

The fabric is soft, which I like.  The green & blue tank colors are vibrant & fun, but the pink tank is more of a salmon color, instead of a true pink.  I think the sizing chart is not accurate.  I ordered size XL, according to the chart, & even after washing them & putting them in the dryer, they are looser fitting than snug against my body.  I thought they might shrink, a little, even with the 35% cotton content.  The decorative top stitching could be a bit better.

评论概述: Not what I ordered but I still love it
评论详情: Okay the black tank was totally nowhere near the same as the dk grey and fuchsia tank in buttons and material- the black one had silver metal snaps and was a heavier polyester blend material, so if you expect the same materials you may have been mad, but,honestly the black one fit and was good quality and more of something I could wear for the upcoming holidays. Soooooo, they messed up but, I still scored. Love the quality of all 3 pieces. :D

UPDATE: this has stretched out and I’ve only warm it 2 times as of today.  I have to keep pulling it up so my breast aren’t so much exposed as for this army green one. I’d stay with your regular size even if you want it looser. It will stretch out as you wear it. I’m not sure how long this will last because of the stretch. This one feels softer than the wine color I got also. I got that one in  a small and the army green in medium, which I love the medium best because I like a slightly looser fit. I’m a 36A, longer on the upper torso than my legs. I’m 5’2 , usually a small or medium.  I love the green and wine . Love the kind of rustic kind of look. Very casual which is how I dress.  The green is a dark color then it shows in my video but lighter of course in brighter light. I got the T green also but getting that one tomorrow, i believe. I’ll do another review! As may as well.  I’m h and I hand washed it like the wine and it ran an odd almost pinkish color oddly. I’d wash any of these colors first unless it’s a very light color .  Soaked it in cold water , salt and vinegar. It’s makes your colors last longer.  The t green isn’t as soft as the army green. So odd . It irritated my upper armpit area  from the friction and the ribbed material. Also horrible to wear on a hot humid day. No airflow and made it itchy. I will only wear this in low 80 temps with no humidity.
I have 2 and love them!!

评论概述: It's not the same blue pictured
评论详情: It's a nice shirt. I normally wear a large, but I returned the large in another color bc it was a little snug in my belly area. The xl gives more room in the mid section and fits the same ever where else. It does have a lot of stretch to it. I have not washed this brand of shirt yet but I have in another brand and same style shirt. I wasted it alone and hung it to dry. I think it will shrink up some.

This is a cute tank, with soft comfortable fabric. However, being a 38D, and generally a size 10 -12 with a fairly trim (but far from perfect) torso, I bought it in XL, based on other reviews. But this is way too big, even after a wash in hot water and extra drying.  I think it's too late to send back after that, so I'll keep it - well actually, them, as I bought it in both dark gray and wine red and both have the same problem- so a word of caution: if you want this top to fit snugly and contour to your curves definitely DO NOT go a size up, or it will just hang off of you. The sizing chart corroborated that decision to order XL and the detailing (fabric patch) around the buttons has a rough, unfinished edge, so I'm taking a star off for that, but otherwise it's a very nice tank, not too thin not to thick.
I love how these feel and look!!!

This is a cute tank, I also have it on green. However the white is very sheer, not at all the same fabric as the other one. Just need to make sure your nude bra matches your skin well under this one. I would get in other colors, just not white.

评论概述: Cute, I think close to size stated, fabric not as nice as hoped.
评论详情: Cute, I think close to size stated. Reason 4 star was fabric wasn't as nice as I'd hoped. Although fine for quick run to the store or around house.

If I'm not in dresses in the summer I'm usually in tank tops and I've already added multiple colors of this one to my collection. The top itself is slimmer fit (as shown in the picture) but is soft and stretchy with some extra length to keep it in place. I like the button design, though the area around that does curl up on the edges a little, but nothing that makes it look bad. Based on my experience the lighter colors (for me it was the light green and white ones) are a little see-through, but the darker colors (brown, dark grey, and black) are not. Overall a very comfortable tank top that I'll be wearing often.
I love this tank. It’s so comfortable, stylish. I’m going to order more.
Will definitely purchase more in different colors. Great value

It's too big. There are gaps at the neckline and the armholes and it's slightly longer than I'd like. It's always a risk to order sleeveless tops as a flat chested woman. I won't bother returning it, I can wear it around the house.
looks cute and fits well,  but Plackette sewn poorly. Cut raw  fabric edge not sewn under.. looks cheaply made. Having said this it is cute but will probably fall apart in the wash?
Color was a bit off but I kept it anyway

Cute shirt but with most white tank tops you can see through it some. I wore a plaid shirt over mine to a local rodeo and it was very cute. I feel it does run small and I should have sized up - especially with a larger chest.

评论概述: I like it other than colors are off
评论详情: Coloring is off, which I've noticed is a pattern for most colors. I got the Pink T (I think) which looked like a medium blush color to me. I didn't want hot pink, baby pink, or just straight pink. I like the darker shades. It's off, more of a salmon shade. The stitching around the buttons, I like! That's 1 of the reasons I chose this. I like that it looks kinda shaggy and raw and not perfect. It's supposed to look this way guys!!! (I saw this complaint several times) All other stitching was great. I wear a black tank under it and you can't see thru it to for it to look weird or make the color look bad. I got XL and I'm 190 and 5 3. It fit slightly loose around my waist/hips, I almost exchanged it, but its so minor that I think a large would be too small. It appears kinda boxy shaped, which I'm not a fan of, cuz when you've got more body area, it just shortens it up even more, so i like slim fit and longer appearing tops better. You can always pull/scrunch them up a little, you're outta lot when you're outta fabric. BUT it wasn't noticeable while I was wearing it. Also, don't dry it when washing ! I never dry new items.

评论概述: Nice tank but the color was off
评论详情: I ordered wine red expecting a more purpley maroon like the picture shows, but it’s more of a brick red. It’s still a nice color but it isn’t really what I wanted. Other than that, the tank is really nice, the fabric is soft and stretchy, not see through, and the cut/the way it falls on the body is very flattering.

The color and style is really cute. The material is not too thick, ut not see through.i gotthe mustard and its true to color. I deducted a star because the fit is not described well. Its huge. Im normally between a small and medium, so i ordered a small. I should have gotten an extra small. And even then, im guessing it would be loose. I would order again

评论概述: Cute top but doesn’t match photo
评论详情: Straps are wider, neckline is higher and it’s a lighter/more muted purple than in the photos.  Good material, though, and button detailing is cute.
Fits nice and washes well.  Kelly green color 💚 was just what I wanted.
I love the tee, very soft nice material, fits well. My issue is the color shown is not the same. The color is lighter than what’s shown. I will keep and may try another color.
If you are in between sizes, don’t just go up to the next size- go two sizes up. Not only slimmer fit but also a shorter length. Good material though.
Love the material however the red tank is not red it is more of an orange color. Tank runs big lightweight and soft.

I bought these to go under a cover they are not very thick. They are a smig transparent. I love the way the fabric feels I have not noticed any shrinkage with washing. The Fabric is soft. It helps add a layer of warmth. The Shape is ideal for curvy women!
Nice. Fit well and comfortable
not my favorite but it’s ok

Love this shirt! It fits well. The fabric is comfortable. Material stretches well but isn’t see through. Only issue is that the moment you sweat, everyone will know. If you live in a cooler area you can probably get away with wearing this regularly without issue. Going to wear again with undershirt to see if that makes a difference.

评论概述: Colors not accurate but like the fit
评论详情: The blue color is nothing like what's shown in the photo,  is a much lighter blue, whereas the listing is almost purple.  I like the fit and wide shoulders so a bra doesn't show.  Quality is average to  what I expect for the price, will see if it holds uo
I thought this would be more of a salmon color and it's a bit more like traffic cone orange. But I still love it.

评论概述: Love the cut, but not the color shown
评论详情: Cotton fit are great, so great that I’ve purchased a few of these. But this one was a totally different color than what I thought it would be. I received a sky blue tank top instead of this beautiful more purply blue shown in the photo.

I am 5'4 and around 145lbs depending on the day lmao. I got a Large and it's a little loose, but not so much to be unflattering. I prefer it looser, so it worked out. I got two of them and a long sleeve version and they're all comfortable and cute. Have worn them a lot.
I like material, is thin, good for summer. Color is good!
Bought this for July 4th. It’s fine, but I was hoping for a slightly more fitted tank. I bought the small and it’s pretty loose. For reference I’m 5’4 125lbs
True to size but the fuchsia is more of a Barbie pink. Still cute but not as pictured or expected.

Love it. Fits true to size. Not super tight. I have medium tanks from Target that fit much more tightly than this one. I got the brown and it’s more of a dark mustard yellow or light orange color but that’s what I was expecting based on some of the other review pictures.  I may buy more colors!

These tanks run a touch small. If you like your shirts loose, you may need to size up. They feel fairly thick and yet one of the colors seemed slightly see through. The fabric was a little itchy before washing - hoping it softens but doesn’t shrink too much.

评论概述: Size is bigger than you expect.
评论详情: The color is beautiful and the material is very thin and it is not a tight fit. I bought a small (36C) and small waist but the top is still big looks more like a medium. But its super cute and its comfy. Going to wash them (bought two) and see how it goes from there. I will definitely buy again.
Perfect fit and very cute

评论概述: A bit snug for the size given.
评论详情: The top is drip dry after washing. Edges at the bottom of the button should have been stitched to the garment. Some colors show stretching more than others.
It’s a cute top true to size. But the white is see through . Not much stretch to it . It’s a different fabric than the army green one. I’m 5’11 36G bust

I’m 5’, 145 lbs and a 38DD. I ordered 2 XL tanks at the same time, one in brown and one in dark purple. The brown arms are huge. Sticks out under the armpits quite a bit. However the purple is absolutely perfect! I think they are worth buying a few colors and seeing how they fit. I’m tempted to buy another brown and see if it changes or if the brown is just bigger than normal..
This tank top was a bit thinner than it looks and had bigger buttons. I expected a bit more quality material. Runs a bit loose. It is comfortable for yardwork but not a cami I'd wear to go out in.
This was amazing. Fits perfect .

I purchased this in an XL.  I always but my tops in XL because I do not like anything clingy.  For reference, I am 5'4 and 142lbs.  I could get buy with a L just fine but I'm weird.This shirt is very well made.  I do not plan on putting it in the dryer however, as I usually hang most of my Tees which makes them last longer.  It fit really well and was not tight in the least.  I like where it hit me as well as the length.For the price, I would recommend this tank.  I actually went back and purchased a few more of them.

First of all, buy this now. So cute, so versatile, and a great layering piece! For reference, I’m 5’3” 185 lbs with a 34G bust and actively on a weight loss journey. Due to my bust size, I went with the XL. I could probably get away with the Large, but I don’t want my girls feeling trapped. Also, I LOVE the length. This isn’t a long tank, but it also isn’t cropped. Goes just to the waist line and allows enough coverage if you’d want to wear low rise or mid rise pants. However, if you wear high rise pants, it also looks cute with those and not too much fabric to move around to make it look right. I ordered one just to see if I like it, and then immediately ordered 2 more when the first one arrived! I’m sure come Summer, I’ll be buying even more.
really nice tank.  You can layer or where alone.  Nice color and flattering cut on the chest and hem.
Cute tank. Fit is okay but the material isn’t very soft. It’s not see through. I ordered a medium and probably should have gotten a small.
Fits great and cute

I actually love this tank top.  It's unique and good quality.  The only reason I gave it 4 stars is they are not true to size.  Need to go up 1 size.  So medium fits like a small.  Otherwise a great product and I love the style.

评论概述: Great tops for the money. I’d lean towards smaller when purchasing
评论详情: Bought a bunch of things for my girlfriend before we went to Hawaii and picked up a few colors of this tank. She is 5’4”, slim with 34C and this fit a little loose in medium. Small would be perfect.
What i disliked was the tank was delivered in a clear bag. Anyone can see what it was. Other than that, cute!

This is my favorite bright white tank. It’s thick so you can’t see your bra. It’s washable and wears well! It doesn’t get ball on it or collect stuff on it. It worth every penny! It’s keeps the perfect temperature. Cutest wooden buttons. You can dress up or wear casual.
I like this tank top so much I bought another one in a different color and will buy more. The fabric is thick and soft. Small fits a little like medium roomy and comfortable.
Fits nice quality material
I bought 1 and went and bought 3 other colors. So cute and comfortable
I really like this tank. Covers cleavage and not too snug. It’s become one of my go-to tanks.
I bought 2, very soft, flattering and well made.

评论概述: Blue and Grey pretty, but orange is ugly
评论详情: I adore the grey and blue tank, but the orange is not a burnt orange as shown, but a bright, almost neon orange sherbet color. I hate it and I waited too long to return it. Going to try and wash it with something and change the color.  as for the other colors, gorgeous and it is a flattering fit and soft fabric.

I am impressed with the quality of this tank top! Fits well to body, not to tight and not to loose. The material is good, not to thick that makes you feel sweaty, the material is not to transparent either. I’ve already worn it a couple times and washed it as well and the fabric hasn’t shrunk or has the color faded. I am going back to buy more colors! Great value for your money!

I bought a large!!!!!! The reviews said size down if you wanted it fitted. I am normally a 2x. Im 5'4 250lbs. It stayed down in my jeans so that was a plus. The little flap under the buttons didn't bother me like others said.
This is one of my fav tops thinking of buying another one
These are soft, good quality and great fit. These are a huge value for the price! I bought 3 colors. It is my new go to tank top. You will love them! True to size!
Love these summer tanks,  great price, plenty of colors to choose from. They wash well,  love stretchiness of material. Can’t go wrong I’ve bought numerous pairs. Try them you’ll love them

I love these and I plan to purchase more in different colors. They are of great quality, the material is soft and not flimsy but will last . I have one recommendation I purchased my normal size and I will keep the one that I purchased  but  I plan to buy them one size smaller as they do  run a bit larger so I would by a size smaller then what you would normally buy.
True to size

I now own 4 different colors of this exact top because I love it so much. The blue is such a nice color it is now my favorite. The fit is pretty true to size. The fabric has some stretch to it but it still holds its shape well. Very good price for the money. I haven’t noticed any skrinking even on a hot cycle.

I ordered several of these and this is the only one that had a different feel and wears different. I don't like the feel and the way it sits on my body. It's uncomfortable. The other ones I wear daily because I absolutely love the way they feel and the colors are great.
Cute and comfy
Love it!
Perfect lightweight tank for summer
Cute, well made, nice thick fabric - not see through at all. Purchased in multiple colors, washes well. Would buy again and again!
I only gave 4 stars because the fringe will unravel some with washing, however it is very easy to trim off.
It's an adorable top! But it's definitely pink and not purple.

Kind of disappointed in the color of this tank top. States it is white but it is clearly off white. I’m not returning it by any means, it’s wearable but I would have liked it to be whiter. It is very soft fabric and comfortable. The price was right on point. I bought a medium and it fits my body just right as far as the shape goes. , not too snug and not too big. It’s very light feeling.
Not to low, great fit
I love the feel of the tank top, it's so comfy. It's actually one of my favorites and I wear it all the time.
That button part and cut out design is not a favorite of mine but it fits just fine and color and texture work.
Tank fits well, could be a bit longer, have not washed yet, but will not put in dryer. Fabric is soft and feels nice. I am 5'9" tall and 154lbs. So large is perfect.

I absolutely love this color- it is more vibrant in person. I always need good basic tanks and these (I also bought it in 2 other colors) fit the bill perfectly. You can wear a regular bra with them and they just fit great. I love the button detail, they are like elevated tanks! You will not be able to buy just one. True to size.

So luckily I washed this dark black gray tank with black clothes... I opened the washer to toss something in that I had forgotten and the water was literally jet black with dye everywhere! It's the only new item I threw in this load so it's definitely this tank!!! It's cute but be careful washing if you're buying the darker colors because it's bleeding like crazy!
I bought two of these. They are the perfect amount of stretch and comfy. They pair well with any outfit. Sized to fit. I am in love with these tanks.

Unless you hand wash this too it will lose that new clean look from when you first buy it. It’s a great top for price but cheaply made. Material is stretchy and it you don’t want it form fitting I suggest sizing up. I bought a large with a triple D bra size and I think I’ll be getting another color in XL. If Your are curvy or large chested it is stretchy and form fitting.

The pink is not what is shown in picture. It’s just a standard Walmart pink lol oh well I haven’t worn it but from trying it on feels ok for the price . Like a good standard tank for around the house. I got a small and I’m typically a small/medium. This was regular fit all around and just a little loose around armpits . but if you want it tight like in picture maybe size down. I might add a picture later because that color is very off and I ordered another color wonder what that will be like.
I liked the fit, color & stretch of material.  I have a large chest & need a material that gives for comfort.

This is the perfect summer time ribbed tank top. It’s not thin and not thick; just right If you live in a summer hot zone (I’m in FL), I highly recommend. You can dress it up or down. ⛅️ Enjoy! And I’m definitely buying this in more colors.  Update 3/21/24: Love, love, love. I bought two more, one in white and the other in black. The white is a little see through; however with a nude bra it’s not too bad.
Came as pictured, cute tank. Fit as expected.

The tank top is cute and stretchy. Great price. However, the Amazon size guide is crazy wrong. Amazon suggested my correct size would be an extra large. I typically wear a medium, sometimes a small. Granted I’m not buying a lot of clothes off Amazon, so I just assumed the top ran really small. It does not. I ended up purchasing a large. It’s way too big. A small or even an extra small would have been a much better fit. For reference I am 5’7 150 pounds. 34DD.
